room_title: Escape room "Capone" by Trapped Escape Game in Nashville
review: I went to this escape room today with some friends; none of us had done one before. Overall, it was an amazing experience. Our game master was kind and attentive, the puzzles were challenging and mysterious, and the setting really looked like we had stepped into th 1920s. Super fun!

room_title: Escape room "Capone" by Trapped Escape Game in Nashville
review: The room my friends and I did was Capone-themed room. The puzzles were great and the staff was very helpful. Our game-master Matthew did a top notch job. You could tell that he was truly passionate about his job and made the experience 100x better. We managed to escape with two minutes to spare. 10/10 would go again. If you go be sure to ask for Matthew, you wont regret it.

room_title: Escape room "Capone" by Trapped Escape Game in Nashville
review: A truly great experience, my friends and I had an awesome time. I would for sure go back. The 1930's Capone theme was very original and truly felt like we were in that time. There was also a large rush of adrenaline under the stress of a timed puzzle. Overall it was an exciting time with many twists, turns, and good friends.
